column1: Cart allows negative quantity for products
column32:
Environment:
Website: [https://demo.evershop.io/|https://demo.evershop.io/|smart-link] 
Browser: Google Chrome (Latest)
OS: Windows 10

Steps to Reproduce:

# Add a product to the cart
# Update the quantity to a negative value

Expected Result:
System should restrict quantity to valid positive numbers.

Actual Result:
Negative quantity is accepted without validation.

Severity: High
Priority: P1

column1: Broken link found in website footer section
column32:
Environment:
Website: [https://demo.evershop.io/|https://demo.evershop.io/|smart-link] 
Browser: Google Chrome (Latest)
OS: Windows 10

Steps to Reproduce:

# Scroll down to the footer section

Actual Result:

column1: Product price mismatch between product page and cart
column32:
Environment:
Website: [https://demo.evershop.io/|https://demo.evershop.io/|smart-link] 
Browser: Google Chrome (Latest)
OS: Windows 10

Steps to Reproduce:

# Open a product details page
# Note the product price
# Add the product to cart
# Compare the price shown in the cart

Expected Result:
Product price should be consistent across pages.

Actual Result:
Price shown in the cart differs from the product details page.

Severity: High
Priority: P2

column1: Checkout page loads indefinitely when proceeding from cart
column32:
Environment:
Website: [https://demo.evershop.io/|https://demo.evershop.io/|smart-link] 
Browser: Google Chrome (Latest)
OS: Windows 10

Steps to Reproduce:

# Add multiple products to the cart
# Navigate to the cart page
# Click on "Proceed to Checkout"

Expected Result:
Checkout page should load successfully.

Actual Result:
Page shows a loading indicator indefinitely and does not load.

Severity: Critical
Priority: P1

column1: Add to Cart button does not respond on first click
column32:
Environment:
Website: [https://demo.evershop.io/|https://demo.evershop.io/|smart-link] 
Browser: Google Chrome (Latest)
OS: Windows 10

Steps to Reproduce:

# Open the EverShop website
# Select any product category
# Open a product details page
# Click on the "Add to Cart" button once

Expected Result:
Product should be added to the cart immediately.

Actual Result:
Nothing happens on the first click; sometimes the second click adds the product.

Severity: High
Priority: P1
